title: Man who drugged pregnant girlfriend and filmed himself sexually assaulting her is 'a danger to society' - judge
text: Monday 6 February 2017 Man who drugged pregnant girlfriend and filmed himself sexually assaulting her is 'a danger to society' - judge Isabel Hayes and Sonya McLean Published 06/02/2017 | 14:37 0 Comments Share Man who drugged pregnant girlfriend and filmed himself sexually assaulting her is 'a danger to society' - judge Independent.ie A MAN who drugged his heavily-pregnant girlfriend and filmed himself sexually assaulting her has been described by a judge as a danger to society and to women. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/courts/man-who-drugged-pregnant-girlfriend-and-filmed-himself-sexually-assaulting-her-is-a-danger-to-society-judge-35427668.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article30888783.ece/b1002/AUTOCROP/h342/Depositphotos_27933743_original.jpg Stock photo A MAN who drugged his heavily-pregnant girlfriend and filmed himself sexually assaulting her has been described by a judge as a danger to society and to women.
